title: Gym Preferences
content: I prefer going to the gym early in the morning, ideally between 6:30 AM and 8:00 AM. Leg days are Mondays and Thursdays, upper body on Tuesdays. I avoid working out on weekends.

title: Study Habits
content: I'm most productive studying between 9 AM and 12 PM or after 9 PM. I study 3-4 hours on weekdays and use spaced repetition with short breaks.

title: Freelance Schedule
content: Client meetings usually happen on Wednesdays and Fridays between 2 PM and 5 PM. I prefer coding freelance tasks in the afternoon or early evening. Never schedule freelance work on Sundays.

title: Weekly Routines
content: I attend church every Sunday at 10 AM and take the rest of the day off. Saturdays are for errands and grocery shopping. Friday evenings are for relaxing or social time.

title: Personal Goals
content: I'm learning German and want to practice 30 minutes daily. Also dedicating 6â€“8 hours weekly for portfolio projects. I aim to sleep at least 7 hours a night.
